overview:
To provide wage subsidies directly to qualifying individuals to help offset the income inequality growth that exists between wage earners. This act is intended to narrow the income gap that has been widening since the 1970s.

Specifically, this bill seeks to provide a substantial increase to to the weekly, bi-weekly and monthly pay checks of Americans earning $100,000 or less annually. Additionally, this bill seeks to invest in America's self-employed and small businesses
